quotes.quote: I’m afraid I just blue myself.
quotes.author: Tobias

quotes.quote: There’s always money in the banana stand!
quotes.author: George Sr.

quotes.quote: Has anyone in this family ever even seen a chicken?
quotes.author: Michael

quotes.quote: Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, there’s still plenty of meat on that bone. Now you take this home, throw it in a pot, add some broth, a potato. Baby you got a stew going!
quotes.author: Carl Weathers

quotes.quote: And that’s why you always leave a note.
quotes.author: J. Walter Weatherman

quotes.quote: I don't understand the question and I won't answer it.
quotes.author: Lucille

quotes.quote: I don’t criticize you! And if you’re worried about criticism, sometimes a diet is the best defense.
quotes.author: Lucille
